Links

网站

  • 高场核磁研究中心 厦大高场核磁研究中心网站

工具

  • nmrshiftdb2 有机分子核磁数据库
  • monosaccharidedb 包含776种单糖的数据库
  • glycosciences 糖科学，包含多糖结构、核磁和质谱数据库
  • carbohydrates 包含许多糖科学的相关网站
  • LCS Logic for Structure Determination

Home-build NMR

  • opencore NMR2 Home-make NMR Spectrometer
  • Team Salthouse make a NMR that is affordable, easy to implement and accessible for individuals studying.
  • Doug Marett Home build NMR Spectrometer by Doug Marett 2010, there are the vidoe in youtube.
  • PyPPM A Proton Precession Magnetometer fo all! A device for conducting NMR experiments at Earth’s field.

人物

  • E. Kwan 主要关注他的计算NMR研究。ekwan’s github
  • James Keeler James Keeler Group[the author of Unserstanding NMR Spectroscopy。

学习

  • Assignment Protein ccpnmr的蛋白质指认练习，比较全面的讲解指认过程
  • Computational Organic Chemistry 计算有机化学的博客，作者提供一些前沿最新的计算化学的文章简介。
  • NMR for Chemistry & Enzymology The course provides the application of NMR to solving chemical and biochemial problems.
  • NMR Operator 核磁操作，实验室规则。
  • How to do research Miscellaneous Tools on Research.

NMR课题组和机构

  • IBS Institut de Biologie Structurale, integrated structural biology. There are several software, like as Dynamo, SculptorCNS, Tensor, Pulse sequence tools linker.
  • CERMAX NMR center of france.
  • Manchester NMR Methodology work on DOSY, MAD, implementing homonuclear decoupling / pure shift methods, automated shimming methods, ..

理念性网站

  • SCI-HUB 提倡“平等知识分享权”，打破文献版权壁垒。
